data.title: Knowing The Different Types of Film Genre
data.meta_description: COM - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses film genres and how they are used to categorize different types of films. It defines key elements used to characterize genres like story, characters, settings, themes and narrative discourse. It provides examples of major genre categories like action/adventure, comedy, drama, horror, westerns and animated films. The document also notes that many films fall under hybrid genres that combine elements of multiple genres. Film genres are based on consistent patterns and conventions in their film techniques and storytelling approaches.
data.text: Knowing The Different Types of Film Genre
